body_html: The problem is that, most of the time, this information shows up in logs that people use to report to us and is actually useful. It would make our life harder to help people if we turned that off by default. :( Maybe one day when GPUs are just easier to use, we could turn it off by default.

body: The problem is that, most of the time, this information shows up in logs that people use to report to us and is actually useful.  It would make our life harder to help people if we turned that off by default. :(   Maybe one day when GPUs are just easier to use, we could turn it off by default.
